name: Hipatya in I wanna world
summary: Dive into a challenging and exhilarating adventure with "Hipatya in I Wanna World"! Created for the popular streamer Hipatya, this game combines the intense platforming action of "I Wanna Be the Guy" with unique and creative levels designed to introduce newcomers to the thrilling world of precision platformers. Tailored for novices, "Hipatya in I Wanna World" offers a perfect balance of challenge and accessibility, ensuring a rewarding experience for all players.
